import Item from "./item" import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import Button from './button' import CartContent from './cart-content' let site = 'home' function render(){ if(site == 'home'){ ReactDOM.render(
, document.querySelector(".article")) } else if(site = 'products'){ ReactDOM.render(, document.querySelector('.article')) } ReactDOM.render(, document.querySelector(".cart--wrapper")) document.querySelector(".article").style.WebkitAnimation = 'none' setTimeout(() => { document.querySelector(".article").style.WebkitAnimation = '' }, 10) } export default function Article(){ return (
